Sika Foyer (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ onye mba Togo nwere akwụkwọ obibi America bukwa Onye na-eme ihe mgbasa ozi, ejiji ihe osise ma biri na- arukwa Oru na New York City.
N'afọ 2017, ọ haziri ihe ngosi Affirmative Art na Nagenda International Academy of Art and Design (NIAAD) na Mahadum Makerere dị na Namulanda, Entebbe, Uganda.  N'afọ 2021, ọ natara nzere Master na Fine Arts na Mahadum Lesley dị na Cambridge, Massachusetts.
Ọtụtụ n'ime ọrụ ya n'oge na-adịbeghị anya na-adabere n'echiche nke ikpuchi
na 2021 Ọrụ ya bụ isiokwu nke ihe ngosi Mara River Crossing na Soloway Gallery na Brooklyn, New York
N'otu afọ ahụ, e gosipụtara ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi otu nke ndị oji asaa na-ese ihe n'oge a Legacy na Rupture na City Gallery na New Haven, Connecticut.
